title: Let's look at radio: glimpses of programmes and personalities in the radio world
creator_contributor_role: Australian Federation of Commercial Broadcasting Stations, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Radio programs - Australia - History

description: Gives glimpses of many of the best known radio entertainers in Australia and of popular programs being rehearsed and broadcast. The film emphasises that commercial broadcasting stations provide an entertainment service that is popular with the person in the street. it also shows how they provide the community with other services such as flood and fire warnings in country districts, police messages etc. Commentary: Jack Davey
